pages.name: Hippocampus
pages.text: $(thing)Hippocampi$()$(#734608) are aquatic beasts with the front of a horse and tail of a fish coming in various colors

$(#734608)Hippocampi are the fastest creatures of the sea. They are peaceful and will slowly regenerate health over time.$(br2)Hippocampi can be tamed with sponges, but will continue to wander around when tamed.$(br2)Their behavior can then be altered by interacting with them with a stick.$(br2)Two hippocampi are bred with prismarine crystals

$(#734608)A tamed hippocampus's inventory can be accessed by interacting with it while sneaking in order to equip a saddle, armor, and even carry a chest.$(br2)Upon death, a hippocampus will drop $(item)shiny scales$()$(#734608) and rarely a $(item)hippocampus fin$()$(br2)$(#734608)The shiny scales are used as a component for several crafts like water breathing potions and $(item)tide guardian armor$()
$(#734608)The hippocampus fin is used to craft a $(item)hippocampus slapper$()$(#734608) that briefly stuns the target
